skills.skill: Forklift and mobile lift equipment operations
PLC troubleshooting and ladder logic programming skills
Allen Bradley and Fanuc PLC experience

duties_responsibilities.duty: Troubleshoot, diagnose, and repair hydraulic systems, mechanical issues, and control circuits on production machinery and systems.
Ensure supplies are on hand to complete work and determine the best course of action to return equipment to production in a timely manner.
Construct, repair, and maintain equipment, facility, and grounds to ensure the production of the product lines.
Work on special projects such as rerouting the conveyor, moving machinery, and running gas and air lines.
Assist leaders with ordering spare and repair parts critical to the upkeep and repairs of equipment and systems.
Direct, assist, and educate lower grade technicians on equipment and system repairs and operations.
Perform project work as needed to improve processes and department flow.
Perform all other duties assigned by Supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma/equivalent and two-year technical degree or equivalent training/experience required. Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) training/education; troubleshooting and ladder logic programming skills required.
